user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mark'"'"'s recent inquiry about bank procedures (mark@trustwellbank.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Help Needed: Details for Replying to Mark’s Procedures Inquiry  

Hi [Recipient’s Name],

Could you please:

1. Look in my Gmail for Mark’s recent message (from mark@trustwellbank.com) about teller procedures.  
2. Review any related notes or documents in our Notion workspace—especially the Teller On-Boarding or Bank Procedures pages.  
3. Compile a brief summary of the specific procedures or references Mark is asking about, plus any relevant links or attachments.

Once you’ve gathered that information, let me know (or drop it into our shared doc) so I can finalize my response to him.

Thank you!  
Jane
